author: Jonathan burrito

text:
This is the best ringtone I've ever had. 

- Obscure enough that nobody else has it
- It escalates as it goes on
- Beginning legit sounds like a ringtone too
- Pleasant to listen to instead of being an annoying squeak
- I can still hear it in a crowded area. 

Only problem is that I can never change my ringtone again.

text: Wow, I thought the "Poker Face" thing was intentional. I guess because I identified the melody "She Will Be Loved"  by Maroon 5. @1:48 I guess I thought the whole track was supposed to be full of remixes. text: Well hello there! Congratulations on such a great OST. I'm glad I can help spread the word about the game and its music. Knowing that actual game composers are aware of this list, like you and others who PMed me, is another reason that makes it all worth it for me. So thanks to you as well!
